Wille is Copyright (c) 2008-2011 by its contributing authors, as listed
below in section "Contributing Authors".

This piece of work was originally done as a part of the EU Network of Excellence
project OPAALS. Wille2 has been jointly designed by a working group at the
Hypermedia Laboratory, Tampere University of Technology (in alphabetical order):
Jukka Huhtamaki (Researcher), Ossi Nykanen (Senior Researcher, Team Leader),
and Jaakko Salonen (Researcher). Indirectly, the work has been carried out
in collaboration with several contributing colleagues.

Contributing Authors:
 * Jaakko Salonen
 * Jukka Huhtamaki
 * Ossi Nykanen
